channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Gutenberg Blocks with AI by Kadence WP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Gutenberg Blocks with AI by Kadence WP

item.title: CVE-2024-4057|2024-06-04T06:00:02.423Z -- Unknown -- Gutenberg Blocks with AI by Kadence WP
item.description: The Gutenberg Blocks with AI by Kadence WP WordPress plugin before 3.2.37 does not validate and escape some of its block attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
